alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Barber and Comanche Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Aetna to 9 miles south of Medicine Lodge to 6 miles east of Hazelton. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aetna around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Medicine Lodge and Sharon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
